title: Is it worth choosing an AIIMS institute over any other government medical college? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: You have not specified which AIIMS you are referring too . If it’s the Delhi one then that’s the ultimate but since lots of other AlIMS have also come up which may not be at the Delhi level . Govt medical college are then better as you get a lot of patients treatment exposure . AIIMS have a advance medical treatment facilities but since they are very few the load of Patients care is also overloaded . State run govt. medical colleges have also got a good infrastructure and advanced medical treatment facilities and you can have a wonderful exposure for medical treatment in your designated fields, but the seats are very less and the competition levels are very challenging . The best advantage in state medical government colleges is that the number of patients are very high so the doctors would be get s lot of exposure which otherwise is not so in private medical colleges. Your diagnostic skills improve drastically as you interact with a large number of pateients but only who are responsible and ready to put long working hours becomes successful doctors . The only advantage of AIIMS is the name tag and yes advance medical facilities at subsided rates but the influx of patients over here is also high .

AIIMS being my Alma Mater,I can say with conviction that it scores over others in 3 ways Infrastructure,we have a centrally air conditioned hospital made way back in 1956 by unlimited grant from New ZealandStudents who are the best. They learn from each other and keep the faculty on their toesAutonomy. AIIMS really follows the lines written by Rabindra Nath Tagore “ Where the mind is without fear and the head is held high”
